trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà l'evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged" /> o <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected" /> di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs>, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi in uso, aggiungere all'evento un'istanza del delegato.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [la gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene visualizzato un form contenente un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> controllo che visualizza un anno di calendario.

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting properties like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio viene illustrato l'impostazione di proprietà quali <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> per personalizzare l'aspetto del controllo calendario.

trans-unit.source: Other properties like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bolded.
trans-unit.target: Altre proprietà come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> vengono impostate per personalizzare le date sono indicati in grassetto.

trans-unit.source: The example also sets properties to change the calendar format, including <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, vengono impostate proprietà per modificare il formato di calendario, tra cui <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> vengono gestiti gli eventi e il relativo stato è visualizzato nel form.
